channel.title: Slackware on The Salix Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Slackware on The Salix Blog

item.title: How much of Slackware is in Salix
item.description: That is a question that I had in my mind for a while. At some point I had also done the actual counting, so I had an idea, but I never wrote anything down. There are many people that believe that a derivative distribution only just leeches their parent distribution, maybe changing the default wallpaper or a couple of settings here and there and making a release. I know for a fact that some people that have never tried Salix (or have tried Salix but never Slackware itself) even think the same for Salix.
